modName: Reapers The Dark Tower  - Chinese Translation
summary: This is the Chinese translation of the original Reapers The Dark Tower mod.
descriptionHtml:
This is the Chinese translated version of the original Reapers The Dark Tower. 
Original page:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17863
All credit to the original author Reaper9111.

Introduction
The Mod aims to provide the player with a Unique Evil Tower, design to suit any type of caracter, the Evil and Corrupt Character will mostly like this \"Home\"...

The Mod has several Rooms... And includes Many *New Features*, In this mod you cannot cheat, The mod was not design for this. If you are looking for this type of mod, there\'s a few exellent mod outthere that doe\'s it ! Insted, you will find friendly features that blends perfectly with the spirits of Skyrim...

To gain access to the tower, you will need to go in the Dead Man\'s Drink Inn in Falkreath. There, look next to the door on the floor for a journal...
SPOILER: Go to Falkreath Inn, take the book on the floor next to the exit door, go to BoneChill Passage, Kill the Boss, take the teleportation Book, Learn the spell, Teleport to the tower
Follow the hints in the journal to eventualy get access to the tower...

Please note that the tower is Only accessible via Teleportation Spell... From any Room in the Tower you can Fast travel where you want !

The Tower, doe\'s not have any Map Marker, it was built this way, It\'s not a Bug !

Also note that the Lighting settings in the mod are based on MY own game settings, and might not be exactly the same for you.

Installation
This is only a Chinese .esp file , please go to original page to download the main file.
Please use the NMM to install the MOD.

Credit
All credit with Reaper9111, thank him for this great MOD!

If you like this MOD, please endorse the author, thank you!
